page.description: Defines what images should be shown at run-time.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Dynamic image]* property is used to create one or more dynamic expressions that are used at run-time to determine the image shown in the control. Multiple expressions can be defined in the *[ui:Dynamic Image Genie]*, which can be accessed by clicking the [...] smart field button for the Dynamic image property.
